title: Shiba Inu Passes Dogecoin as No. 10 Cryptocurrency - Slashdot
description: Shiba Inu has entered into the top ten most valuable digital assets by market value, "hitting $40 billion and surpassing its cousin and inspiration, Dogecoin," reports Bloomberg. From the report:  Shiba was up another 10% at midday on Monday and has doubled in value in the past week. Most of that ga...
